sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Q: What is the system requirement for this plugin?

A: At least running on PHP 5.3 and above, and WordPress Version 4.0

Q: Is DX Sales CRM suitable for smartphones and tablets?

A: DX Sales CRM keeps running on all smartphones and tablets. Our framework has been advanced for mobile use and will adjust to the gadget you are presently running the CRM system on. Simply start up the program on your gadget and the Sales CRM automatically identifies what gadget you are on and adjusts as it needs.

Q: How safe is my data?

A: DX Sales CRM is a WordPress framework plugin. It’s an excellent PHP and MySQL powered framework that excels in web security and been trusted by many organisation.

Q: How can this CRM benefit my business?

A: DX Sales CRM can help you:
* Raise consumer loyalty.
* Improve working efficiencies.
* Increase client maintenance and lessen your marketing cost.
* Envision client needs and inclinations.
* Fast service to customers.
* Improve marketing efforts of clients and prospects.

Q: What Makes DX Sales CRM Unique?

A: Our Sales CRM system comes out of the box with marketing automation, client administration, and contact focus functionality. It incorporates powerful management system. It is an incredible all-in-one Sales CRM solution and support premium add-ons at an affordable price.
